name: Mridula Islam
chefBio: Mridula Islam is a renowned Bangladeshi chef, food blogger, and cookbook author. He is known for her traditional Bangladeshi recipes and modern twists on classic dishes.

recipes.name: Shorshe Ilish
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate & fry fish. Cook mustard paste, chili & salt. Add fish & cook. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chingri Malai Curry
recipes.cooking_method: Cook prawns with turmeric & cumin powder. Add coconut milk and cook until thickened. Add green chilies & cook for few mins. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Bhorta
recipes.cooking_method: Roast eggplant. Mash with onion, green chilies, mustard oil, and salt. Serve hot.

name: Rushdah Rozario
chefBio: Rushdah Rozario is a well-known Bangladeshi artist, photographer, and chef. He is the founder of the renowned Yellow Brick Road restaurant in Dhaka, which features a fusion of Bangladeshi and Western cuisines.

recipes.name: Bhuna Khichuri
recipes.cooking_method: Fry onion, garlic & ginger. Add rice & lentil. Add water & cook. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Rezala
recipes.cooking_method: Cook onion, garlic & ginger. Add chicken and cook. Add yogurt & cook until thickened. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Shahi Tukra
recipes.cooking_method: Fry bread. Heat milk, sugar & saffron. Add fried bread to the milk mixture. Garnish with pistachios. Serve cold.

name: Tommy Miah
chefBio: Tommy Miah is a Bangladeshi-born British chef, restaurateur, and author. He is the founder of the award-winning Raj Restaurant in London and has written several cookbooks on Bangladeshi cuisine.

recipes.name: Pitha
recipes.cooking_method: Make dough with rice flour & water. Stuff with coconut & sugar. Cook in boiling water. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Dhaka Biryani
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate chicken with spices & yogurt. Fry potato. Cook rice with spices. Layer rice, chicken & potato. Cook on low heat. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Fuchka
recipes.cooking_method: Mix chickpeas, potato, tamarind paste, cumin powder, and chili powder. Serve in crispy shells.

name: Chandrima Sinha
chefBio: Chandrima Sinha is a Bangladeshi chef and television personality. He is the host of the popular cooking show 'Ranna Banna' and has published several cookbooks on Bangladeshi cuisine.

recipes.name: Rasmalai
recipes.cooking_method: Boil milk. Add lemon juice to curdle. Strain curdled milk. Knead milk solids. Make balls. Boil in sugar syrup. Garnish with cardamom & pistachios. Serve cold.

recipes.name: Bhuna Chicken
recipes.cooking_method: Fry onion, garlic & ginger. Add chicken and cook. Add tomato & cook until thickened. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Kala Bhuna
recipes.cooking_method: Fry onion, garlic & ginger. Add beef and cook. Add spices & cook until thickened. Serve hot.

name: Chef Zakir
chefBio: Chef Zakir is a British chef of Mauritian and Bangladeshi descent. He is the winner of the 2012 season of MasterChef UK and has since released several cookbooks featuring her fusion of Mauritian and Bangladeshi cuisines.

recipes.name: Shorshe Ilish
recipes.cooking_method: Marinate & fry fish. Cook mustard paste, chili & salt. Add fish & cook. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chingri Malai Curry
recipes.cooking_method: Cook prawns with turmeric & cumin powder. Add coconut milk and cook until thickened. Add green chilies & cook for few mins. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Bhorta
recipes.cooking_method: Roast eggplant. Mash with onion, green chilies, mustard oil, and salt. Serve hot.

name: Khondaker Ashraf Hossain
chefBio: Khondaker Ashraf Hossain is a Vietnamese-American chef and television personality, who was born to a Chinese father and a Vietnamese mother in New Zealand. He is the host of several cooking shows, including World Cafe Asia and Bobby Chinn Cooks Asia, and has featured Bangladeshi cuisine in his culinary travels.

recipes.name: Bhuna Khichuri
recipes.cooking_method: Fry onion, garlic & ginger. Add rice & lentil. Add water & cook. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Rezala
recipes.cooking_method: Cook onion, garlic & ginger. Add chicken and cook. Add yogurt & cook until thickened. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Shahi Tukra
recipes.cooking_method: Fry bread. Heat milk, sugar & saffron. Add fried bread to the milk mixture. Garnish with pistachios. Serve cold.
